thread.title: Michelle Cordial
thread.title_full: VIP Electronic Cigarette Ireland reviewed by Michelle Cordial

author: Michelle Cordial
title: Michelle Cordial
text: I recieved bad customer service and salesperson seemed to have no clue what she was talking about as when asked questions she spoke unclearly, muddled and confused, struggled to put together e cigarette and broke it in process and had to replace it and recieved faulty product giving trouble since purchase. Not happy and will be making further complaint.
